data.title: SCP Colorado Springs Hotel
data.meta_description: SCP Colorado Springs Hotel greets guests with a fresh and modern setting. Enjoy a central location in our Colorado Springs Hotel.
data.text:
Next-level wellness amenities, proximity to the Pikes Peak region's natural landmarks, and an emphasis on locally sourced goods - welcome to Soul Community Planet.

Book Direct for Best Rates

Stay Healthy, Kind, and Green during your next visit to Colorado Springs. Book direct for best rates.

Colorado Springs Rooms

Designed for relaxation and focus, our guest rooms offer SCP's signature minimalist style, including sustainable and regionally-sourced materials.

Standard Rooms

Spacious and comfortable, Standard Rooms are in our exterior corridor with one king or two queen beds.

Partial View Rooms

Unwind in our second-floor king rooms with partial mountain views in our exterior corridor.

Deluxe Rooms

In our interior corridor, Deluxe Rooms feature spacious work/wellness areas with one king or two queen beds.

Every Stay Does Good

Every time you choose to stay at an SCP Hotel, you are consciously helping to make the world around us a better place.

LOCALLY SOURCED, HEALTHY OPTIONS

PROVISIONS MARKET

Provisions Market offers locally sourced, fresh, and wholesome grab-and-go options available daily. Local craft beer, kombucha, and Loyal brand coffee are also available anytime you'd like.

SCP FIT

The 5,000-square-foot SCP Fit features state-of-the-art equipment, including Peloton Bikes, free weights, TRX stations, a yoga studio, and on-demand fitness classes. Reset your expectations and discover what's possible at SCP Fit.

Complimentary for SCP Hotel Guests, Open 24/7.

Pool Hours: 10 a.m. - 10 p.m.

SCP COMMONS

SCP Commons is a fresh spin on community space - and a lot of it. The space is outfitted with environmentally friendly furniture, high-speed WIFI, private conference rooms, and unlimited locally sourced Loyal Coffee.

Fair Trade Pricing

Your happiness is our top priority. When you stay with SCP, we guarantee sustainable practices, next-level wellness amenities, modern gathering spaces, and healthy food and drink options. Our Fair Trade Pricing program backs up that promise â€”we let you determine the price you pay at check-out based on the quality of your experience. (Yes, really.)

MEETINGS & EVENTS

Connect and create with engaging, experience driven event spaces at SCP Colorado Springs. Looking to book 10 rooms or more? Let our sales team help with the planning.

Welcome to Holistic Hospitality

Our guests help us fulfill our vision of making the world a better place for the soul, community and planet. We provide thoughtfully-designed, environmentally-friendly places to stay, eat, relax, meet, have fun, work, and self-improve. We give back to our communities through our culture of kindness and by actively supporting surrounding businesses, schools and cultures. We help our planet by following green practices, offering earth-friendly food and beverages, and by planting a tree for each guest who stays with us. We call this Holistic Hospitality.

At SCP Hotels, every stay does good. For those who believe in the power of healthy living, kindness towards others and compassion for the planet, welcome to SCP Colorado Springs Hotel.

SPECIAL OFFERS

STAY LONGER & SAVE

Save up to 25% when you stay longer at SCP Colorado Springs.

PRE-PAY & SAVE 10%
